From the brand

The Technology That Cares

PETKIT is a high-tech company founded in 2013,committed to developing an all-in-one solution through the product line consisting of “eat,drink,clean,sleep,and fun” to encourage an intelligent life with your fur pal.

PETKIT proudly creates elegant,sustainable,and cost-effective products that won Red Dot Design Award,iF Design Award,and a number of patents,which have provided to over 30 countries all over the world.

PURA MAX AUTOMATIC CAT LITTER BOX

PURA X AUTOMATIC CAT LITTER BOX

AUTOMATIC PET FEEDERS

PET WATER FOUNTAINS

PET BACKPACK CARRIERS

ACCESSORIES

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.3 x 6.3 x 6.22 inches; 1.48 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 15, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PETKIT
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B083DM9XN9

Ultra-quiet pump(below 30dB),low energy consumption,gives you and your pets 100% sweet sleep
Smart LED Indicator Light remind you the fountain working status.SMART and NORMAL mode are available
Triple Filtration System provides healthy, fresh and oxygen-enriched water for your pets
Note:Powered with USB cable (5V adapter not included) and Pump is replaceable










Intuitive to monitor

The built-in led light reminds you of the fountain’s working status, such as water shortage and filter replacement.

Auto shut-off for protection

The pump will automatically shut off when the water storage level is too low.

Easy to clean

The pump is detachable, replaceable, and very easy to clean.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:23:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

PETLIBRO was founded in 2019 in C.A., USA, in the belief that pet owners should be able to easily connect with their pets via trustable products.

Since established, with our affection for pets and obsession with detail, we have designed products that pet owners would desire and shipped to homes in the US, UK, Germany, French, CA and Japan.

Top Saving Fountain

Top Saving Feeder

Top Saving Feeder

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.27 x 3.54 x 11.02 inches; 1.6 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PLWF003
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 18, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PETLIBRO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08ZCY1FJT
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Food-grade & Dishwasher Safe: PETLIBRO pet water fountain is made entirely of 304 stainless steel. It’s BPA-free, rust- and corrosion-resistant, and can be washed in the dishwasher.
Adjustable Water Flow: The water flow of the PETLIBRO water dispenser can be adjusted to suit your pet’s preference, attracting it to drink more water, which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Super Quiet & Easy to Use: A silent pump means this dog water dispenser operates below 30dB, which is almost inaudible. The ergonomic handle makes it easy to pull the lid off to clean inside and add water.
24/7 Filtered Fresh Water: PETLIBRO automatic pet fountain is equipped with a filter and pre-filter sponge. The double filtration system filters hair and other debris to remove odors and impurities, providing purified running water for your pet. (Replace filter every 2-4 weeks) Search “B08ZCTGNGD” for filter.
Leak- & Splash-proof Design: Overflow is prevented by a raised pump holder, and the trumpet-shaped water outlet pipe can prevent splashing of water even when the water outlet is blocked by a pet’s naughty paw. We offer 30 days free return and 1 year warranty, please feel free to contact us to get a satisfied solution.

We focus on the unique needs of pets. Our affection for pets and obsession with detail, is what leads us to make premium products constantly, deliver a convenient lifestyle to you, and help your pets have a better life.

Keep Your Pet Hydrated and Healthy

PETLIBRO Stainless Steel Pet Water Fountain is designed for cats, dogs and other medium-sized pets. Enough intake of water plays an important role in the health of your pets. As pet lovers, we designed the stainless steel water fountain to take care of your adorable pets by attracting them to love drinking water.

  • SUS 304 Stainless Steel Body
  • 2L Large Water Capacity
  • Adjustable Water Flow
  • Double Filtration System(Please search “B08ZCTGNGD” to buy the true filters)
  • Runs Quietly( ≤30dB )
  • Dishwasher Safe
  • Leakage-proof & Splashing-proof
  • 5.9ft cable

Read more

Read more

Important Note:

  1. Only for indoor use.
  2. For your pet’s health and a longer pump service life, it is recommended to change the water thoroughly and clean the Water Tank, Tray, Foam Filter and Pump at least once a week.
  3. If you have multiple pets, it is recommended to clean the water fountain and change the filter more often.
  4. For your pet’s health, please search “B08ZCTGNGD” to purchase the real PETLIBRO Filters, DO NOT use the cheap and pirated filters.
  5. If your pet refuses to use the water fountain, it’s recommended to leave its previous water source next to the water fountain for a while. Your pet may need some time to get familiar with it. If your pet gets used to drinking from this Water Fountain, you can remove the previous water source.
  6. If the water fountain makes more noise, please check if the water level reaches the minimum level and if the impeller is covered by the scale. It is recommended to clean the impeller once a week.
  7. How to remove the scale: Remove the pump cover, soak for 30 minutes with a 1:1 ratio of white vinegar and aqueous solution or food-grade citric acid.
  8. Not recommended for large-sized dogs.
  9. If the Water Fountain is dispensing a low amount of water or dispensing no water, you can reset it by following the steps below:

  • Check if you have properly installed the Top Tray, make sure to refill water to the maximum level.
  • Wash and clean the Water Pump. (Recommended reference cleaning video)
  • If washing doesn’t work, please clean the tough scaling on the water pump and the impeller.





Stainless Steel Water Fountain
Capsule Fountain – Stainless Steel
Dockstream Wireless Cat Water Fountain
Dockstream Water Fountain With Wireless Pump
2 Months Set of Replacement Filters
Replacement Water Pump
